      • getDate

        public static java.util.Calendar getDate(java.lang.String dayString_)
        This method returns a Calendar object at mid-day corresponding to a date matching the format specified in DATE_FORMAT or a day in reference to today e.g today, today-1, today+10
        Parameters:
        dayString_ - The string to be converted to a date
        Returns:
        The calendar object corresponding to the day, or object corresponding to today's date if an error occurred

      • toggleEditTextVisibility

        public static void toggleEditTextVisibility(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject,
                                            AppCompatEditText editText)
                                     throws org.json.JSONException
        This method adds an attribute to toggle visibility of the edit text You will find it useful when working with calculations that require you to check whether the value is empty since hidden widget defaults to '0'
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - JsonObject that defines the edit Text
        editText - The edit text that you want to toggle its visibility
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - throws JsonException

      • formatCheckboxValues

        public static java.lang.String formatCheckboxValues(java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                                                    org.json.JSONArray valueItemJSONArray,
                                                    int i)
                                             throws org.json.JSONException
        Returns formatted checkbox values in this format: [item1, item2, item2] Can be used to return list of selected checkbox keys or the list of values for checkboxes
        Parameters:
        sb - String builder to be used for the formatting
        valueItemJSONArray - JsonArray with the selected values from the checkbox
        i - index flag used to determine whether to get list for keys/values; 0 returns key list, 1 returns values list
        Returns:
        List of selected keys or values
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - exception thrown
